column4: can someone help me with links not opening in my broswer, any link i try to click FF wont open it in the browser even if i hold control please and thanks@!
try killing firefox and opening? do new tabs open?
firefox functions fine and opens links within the browser fine but if you were to type a link in this chat it wouldnt open in the browswer same with links in gaim or amsn
ah, not sure, I just right click, add to clipboard, alt f2, type "firefox" and hit paste
